bill_title: revise the 911 emergency surcharge, to revise the collection and distribution of the emergency surcharge revenue, to provide for point of sale collection of the prepaid wireless 911 emergency surcharge, and to provide funding for the upgrade of 911 emergency services.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to revise the 911 emergency surcharge, to revise the collection and distribution of the emergency surcharge revenue, to provide for point of sale collection of the prepaid wireless 911 emergency surcharge, and to provide funding for the upgrade of 911 emergency services. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. The 911 emergency surcharge and the collection and distribution of the emergency surcharge revenue shall be amended. Section 2. The point of sale for the prepaid wireless 911 emergency surcharges shall be defined. Section 3. Funding for the upgrade of 911 emergency services shall be provided. 180 copies were printed on recycled paper by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.063 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
